dimensions.description: Dimensions defines the list of additional dimensions on top of the provided: - service.name - span.name - span.kind - status.code The dimensions will be fetched from the span's attributes. Examples of some conventionally used attributes: https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-collector/blob/main/model/semconv/opentelemetry.go.

exemplars.description: Exemplars defines the configuration for exemplars.
